//Author:Hena Firdaus
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	string r;
	int idx,sum,j,k,fidx,t,i;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	cin>>r;
	int len=r.length();
	
	vector<int>v;
	
	for(j=0;pow(2,j)<=len;j++)
	{
      	idx=pow(2,j);
      	sum=0;
      	
      	for(k=idx+1;k<=len;k++)
      	{ 
      		if(k&(1<<j))
      		{
      			sum+=r[k-1]-'0';
      			      		}
      	}
        //cout<<"idx:"<<idx<<" sum:"<<(sum)<<" org:"<<r[idx-1]-'0'<<endl;
      	if((sum%2)!=(r[idx-1]-'0'))
      	{
      		v.push_back(j);
      	}
	}
    //for(j=0;j<v.size();j++)
	//	cout<<v[j]<<" ";
	//cout<<endl;
	for(i=1;i<=len;i++)
	{
		int c=0;
		for(j=0;j<v.size();j++)
		{
			if(i&(1<<v[j]))
				c++;
		}
		if(c==v.size())
		{
			fidx=i;
			break;
		}
	}
	
	string m="";
	for(i=1;i<=len;i++)
	{
		if(i&(i-1))
		{   
			if(i==fidx)
				{if(r[i-1]=='0')
					m+='1';
				else
					m+='0';}
			else
			m+=r[i-1];
		}
	}
	cout<<m<<endl;
	}
	return 0;

}
